text: Piptostigma giganteum is a species of plant in the Annonaceae family. It is endemic to Nigeria. It is threatened by habitat loss.World Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998. Piptostigma giganteum. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 23 August 2007. ==References== Category:Flora of Nigeria Category:Annonaceae Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Endemic flora of Nigeria Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
